diff_analysis.evidence: The patch removes HTML escaping (escape-html) before assigning to innerHTML in multiple places: category name (this.i18n.categories[category]), emoji name (emoji.name), and search not-found message (this.message). If any of these values can be influenced by user input or untrusted data, this allows injection of arbitrary HTML/JS into innerHTML, leading to a cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability.
